item.title: 独家：外国汽车经中国流入俄罗斯，规避乌克兰战争制裁
item.description: 路透社查阅的注册数据及对五名相关人士的采访显示，数万辆汽车正通过灰色市场渠道从中国出口至俄罗斯。这些交易往往规避了西方及亚洲政府的制裁措施，也绕开了汽车制造商退出俄罗斯市场的承诺。【原文：Tens of thousands of cars are being exported from China to Russia under gray-market schemes that often circumvent Western and Asian government sanctions and automakers' commitments to exit the Russian market, according to registration data reviewed by Reuters and interviews with five people involved in the trade.】

item.title: 中美、中墨在关税贸易紧张局势中举行会谈
item.description: 中国首席贸易谈判代表李成刚周一在北京会见了墨西哥经济部副部长维达尔·列雷纳斯，这是自墨西哥对华进口商品加征关税引发中方警告后，双方首次举行面对面会谈。【原文：China's chief trade negotiator Li Chenggang met Mexico's Deputy Economy Minister Vidal Llerenas in Beijing on Monday, in the first face-to-face talks since Mexico imposed higher tariffs on Chinese imports, drawing warnings from Beijing.】

item.title: 市场嗅到机遇，动荡的美国催生"中等强国"行动
item.description: 华盛顿曾主导的经济、贸易和安全领域全球秩序正被美国总统唐纳德·特朗普颠覆，促使盟友们采取行动。金融市场对此已有所察觉。【原文：The global order once championed by Washington across economics, trade and security is being upended by U.S. President Donald Trump, galvanising allies to action. Financial markets are taking note.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行表示劳动力市场已趋于稳定，与通胀压力相一致
item.description: 澳大利亚央行一位高级官员周四表示，该国劳动力市场已从放缓中趋于稳定，且依然紧张，这与经济中顽固的通胀压力相一致。【原文：Australia's labour market has stabilised from a slowdown and remains tight, consistent with stubborn inflationary pressures in the economy, a senior central bank official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国联想第三季度利润下降21%，强劲营收超出预期
item.description: 中国联想集团周四公布的数据显示，其第三季度利润下滑21%，但强劲的营收增长抵消了利润率压力，最终业绩超出分析师预期。【原文：China's Lenovo Group reported on Thursday a 21% drop in third-quarter profit, but beat analyst expectations as strong revenue growth helped offset margin pressures.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，美国陆军在埃尔帕索机场附近使用了AeroVironment公司的LOCUST反无人机激光武器
item.description: 两名知情人士向路透社透露，美国陆军周三在埃尔帕索国际机场附近部署了AeroVironment公司的LOCUST激光反无人机武器系统，导致该空域关闭长达七小时。【原文：The U.S. Army deployed AeroVironment Inc's LOCUST laser counter-drone weapon system near El Paso International Airport on Wednesday, leading to a seven-hour airspace shutdown, two people briefed on the situation told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国出台汽车行业指导方针以遏制价格战
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周四发布了针对汽车行业的指导方针，旨在规范定价行为、遏制价格战并防止不公平竞争。【原文：China's market watchdog on Thursday released guidelines for the auto industry aimed at regulating pricing behaviour, curbing price wars and preventing unfair competition.】

item.title: 香港IPO热潮中，中资银行面临人才短缺考验
item.description: 业内人士和分析师指出，人才短缺可能削弱中国投行在香港蓬勃发展的上市业务，并考验其满足新规要求的能力——新规对投行可承接的委托项目数量设定了限制。【原文：A shortage of talent risks undercutting Chinese investment banks' booming listing business in Hong Kong and tests their ability to meet new regulatory rules on the number of mandates they can accept, said industry sources and analysts.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会对苹果新闻偏袒左翼媒体报道的指控表示担忧
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）主席周三表示，该机构已就苹果新闻（Apple News）涉嫌推广左翼新闻媒体报道、压制保守派出版物内容的指控向苹果公司提出关切。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has raised concerns with Apple about accusations that Apple News promotes news articles from left-wing news outlets and suppresses content from conservative publications, the FTC's chairman said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美洲开发银行行长称萨尔瓦多将于2026年获得13亿美元援助
item.description: 美洲开发银行行长伊兰·戈尔德法恩周三与萨尔瓦多总统纳伊布·布克莱会晤后宣布，该行将于2026年向萨尔瓦多提供13亿美元资金，用于支持经济发展项目。【原文：The Inter-American Development Bank will provide $1.3 billion in funds to El Salvador in 2026, IDB President Ilan Goldfajn said following a meeting on Wednesday with President Nayib Bukele to discuss economic development programs.】

item.title: 亚洲股市创历史新高，美国就业数据推升收益率与美元
item.description: 亚洲股市周四创下历史新高，而美元兑多数货币小幅走强（日元除外），因强于预期的美国就业数据削弱了短期降息预期，为周五的通胀报告铺平道路。【原文：Asian stocks rose to a record high on Thursday, while the dollar firmed a touch against most currencies except the yen after stronger-than-expected U.S. jobs data dented near-term rate cut expectations, setting the stage for the inflation report on Friday.】

item.title: 日元持续走强令美元承压
item.description: 日元强势反弹、澳元飙升、人民币稳步升值，美元周四承压下行，本周跌势渐显，投资者目光转向即将公布的美国就业与通胀数据。【原文：A resurgent yen, runaway Aussie and steadily rising yuan had the dollar under pressure on Thursday and drifting toward a weekly drop, as investor focus turned to the next batch of U.S. labour and inflation data.】

item.title: 油价因美伊紧张局势担忧而上涨
item.description: 周四早盘油价小幅上涨，因投资者担忧美国与伊朗之间不断升级的紧张局势。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Thursday morning as investors worried about escalating tensions between the U.S. and Iran.】

item.title: 美国称应用材料公司将支付2.52亿美元解决非法芯片出口问题
item.description: 美国商务部周三宣布，与应用材料公司达成2.52亿美元的和解协议，以解决该公司涉嫌向中国非法出口美国半导体制造设备的问题。【原文：The U.S. Department of Commerce on Wednesday announced a $252 million settlement with Applied Materials to resolve the company's alleged illegal exports of U.S. semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China.】

item.title: 华尔道夫酒店的中国业主计划出售标志性纽约酒店，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，纽约标志性酒店华尔道夫的中文业主正准备出售这家豪华酒店，此前该酒店耗资数十亿美元翻新后重新开业仅数月。【原文：The Chinese owners of the iconic Waldorf Astoria in New York City are preparing to put the luxury hotel up for sale, months after it reopened following a multibillion-dollar overhaul, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 不止是游戏：虚拟男友在中国俘获人心
item.description: 周女士，33岁，中国公务员，学生时代曾认为爱情与伴侣终会随时间自然而至。【原文：When Zhou, a 33-year-old Chinese civil servant, was a student, finding love and companionship was something she believed would happen with time.】

item.title: 美国法官称美国银行涉嫌"鲁莽漠视"行为支持爱泼斯坦诉讼案
item.description: 美国一名法官周三表示，针对美国银行被指控对已故金融家杰弗里·爱泼斯坦从事性交易活动的信息存在严重疏忽的指控，足以让拟议的集体诉讼继续推进。【原文：A U.S. judge on Wednesday said accusations Bank of America recklessly disregarded information that the late financier Jeffrey Epstein engaged in sex trafficking were sufficient to let a proposed class action lawsuit proceed.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称五角大楼正推动人工智能公司扩展至机密网络
item.description: 五角大楼正敦促OpenAI和Anthropic等顶尖人工智能公司，使其人工智能工具能在机密网络上使用，且不受这些公司通常对用户施加的诸多限制。【原文：The Pentagon is pushing the top AI companies including OpenAI and Anthropic to make their artificial-intelligence tools available on classified networks without many of the standard restrictions that the companies apply to users.】

item.title: 中国人工智能初创企业智普因需求增长而提高编程课程价格
item.description: 中国人工智能初创企业智普周四宣布，将上调其GLM编程计划的订阅价格，以应对用户数量激增带来的压力——越来越多用户正借助其人工智能模型获取编程支持。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup Zhipu on Thursday said it was raising prices for subscriptions to its GLM coding plan to accommodate a rapid increase in users tapping its AI models for coding support.】

item.title: 波音公司供应链质量显著提升
item.description: 波音公司一位高管周三表示，过去两年间，该公司在商用飞机供应链方面取得了巨大的质量改进。【原文：Boeing has seen huge quality improvements in its commercial airplane supply chain over the last two years, an executive at the planemaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚ASX集团成本激增，CEO离职与监管调查双重冲击下2026年成本飙升
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司周四警告称，2026年成本将大幅上升，这加剧了因首席执行官海伦·洛夫豪斯计划离职引发的抛售潮，并掩盖了上半年基本利润的增长。【原文：Australia's ASX Ltd warned of sharply higher 2026 costs on Thursday, extending a sell-off sparked by CEO Helen Lofthouse's planned exit and overshadowing a rise in first-half underlying profit.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，俄罗斯封锁了Meta旗下的WhatsApp即时通讯服务。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，俄罗斯当局已将Meta旗下WhatsApp从该国互联网监管机构运营的在线目录中移除。此前该应用在俄拥有至少1亿用户。【原文：Russian authorities have removed Meta Platforms -owned WhatsApp, which had at least 100 million users in the country until recently, from the equivalent of an online directory run by the internet regulator, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本1月批发通胀放缓，日元进口价格上涨
item.description: 日本1月份批发通胀率连续第二个月放缓，但以日元计价的进口成本上升，周四公布的数据显示，这表明日元疲软将继续对物价形成上行压力。【原文：Japan's annual wholesale inflation slowed for the second straight month in January but yen-based import costs rose, data showed on Thursday, suggesting a weak yen will continue to put upward pressure on prices.】

item.title: 艾伯维就保妥适价格管制起诉美国卫生机构
item.description: 艾伯维公司周三起诉美国卫生与公众服务部，对联邦医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心对肉毒杆菌注射剂实施价格管控的决定提出质疑。【原文：AbbVie sued the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services on Wednesday, challenging a decision by the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to impose price controls for Botox.】

item.title: 薪酬软件制造商Paycom预测2026年营收疲软，股价下跌
item.description: Paycom Software周三公布的年度营收预期低于华尔街预期，因企业预算收紧导致人力资源及薪资软件采购延迟或缩减，其股价在盘后交易中下跌逾7%。【原文：Paycom Software forecast annual revenue below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, as businesses delay or reduce HR and payroll software purchases amid tighter budgets, sending its shares down over 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国众议院投票反对对加拿大加征关税，罕见地对特朗普政府提出批评
item.description: 美国众议院周三以微弱优势通过一项决议，谴责特朗普总统对加拿大加征关税的决定。在共和党占多数的众议院中，此举实属罕见，是对总统及其党内领导人的公开批评。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives on Wednesday narrowly backed a measure disapproving of President Donald Trump's tariffs on Canada, a rare rebuke of the president and leaders of his party in the Republican-majority House.】

item.title: 巴西银行预计2026年利润将回升
item.description: 巴西国有银行巴西银行周三表示，随着其第四季度业绩超出预期，预计2026年经调整净利润将增长高达26%。【原文：Brazilian state-run lender Banco do Brasil expects its adjusted net profit to grow by up to 26% in 2026, it said on Wednesday, as it posted better-than-expected fourth-quarter results.】

item.title: 澳大利亚保险商IAG因保费增长超预期利润超预期，宣布回购计划
item.description: 澳大利亚保险集团周四公布，其上半年现金收益下滑幅度低于预期，降幅为21%。这得益于总保费收入的增长，在一定程度上抵消了理赔成本上升和投资收益下降带来的负面影响。【原文：Insurance Australia Group on Thursday reported a smaller-than-expected drop of 21% in its first-half cash earnings, as higher gross premiums blunted the impact of increased claims costs and lower investment income.】

item.title: AppLovin因广告业务竞争未达季度营收预期
item.description: 营销平台AppLovin周三公布的第四季度销售额未达市场预期，表明在竞争加剧和宏观经济环境不确定的背景下，其广告服务需求疲软。【原文：Marketing platform AppLovin missed market estimates for fourth-quarter sales on Wednesday, indicating tepid demand for its advertising services amid increasing competition and an uncertain macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: Grab控股公司预测年度营收低于预期，因平台增长势头放缓
item.description: 新加坡Grab周三预测2026财年营收将低于华尔街预期，表明随着消费者应对经济不确定性，这家科技公司核心业务网约车和外卖服务的增长势头正在放缓。【原文：Singapore's Grab forecast fiscal 2026 revenue below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, signaling slower momentum in the tech firm's core businesses of ride hailing and deliveries as consumers grapple with economic uncertainty.】
